dpmCompetition
Class Localizer

java.lang.Object
  dpmCompetition.Localizer

public class Localizer
extends java.lang.Object

Provides robot the capability of localizing itself on the field

Field Summary
private  double dist
          x,y and distance variable
private static int MINIMAL_VALID_WALL_DETECTION_DELAY
          When the localizer is scanning for the end of the wall, if the end of the wall is found under that delay (ms), it means that this wall is not really a wall but a block that has been detected as a wall.
private  Navigation navigation
          Reference to the navigation used by the robot
private  Odometer odo
          Reference to the odometer thread used by the robot

MINIMAL_VALID_WALL_DETECTION_DELAY

private static final int MINIMAL_VALID_WALL_DETECTION_DELAY
When the localizer is scanning for the end of the wall, if the end of the wall is found under that delay (ms), it means that this wall is not really a wall but a block that has been detected as a wall.

seesWall

private boolean seesWall()
Used to see if the robot is facing a wall

Returns:
true if the distance between the wall and the robot is less than 25cm
